name: Cake Shop Great Pastries & Waffles cooking Game
name_original: Cake Shop Great Pastries & Waffles cooking Game
description:
Hey cake lovers! This cake shop game is specially made for you guys.In the game, you will be allowed to prepare different cakes for the customers. Make different bakery items and sell them to the customers. Earn lots of coins and unlock other cake shops included in the game. I hope you can handle all the customers in your shop with many power ups and targets. You will have three-game experience in a single gameplay area. So get this addictive game right now, make delicious cakes and dessert, and sell them to the customers.
Key Features:-

- Enjoy 3 gameplay area in a single game

- Serve customers as per their requirement

- Spice up your gameplay with daily reward & daily challenge

- Unlock all the items & equipment to get more coins

- So many different toppings for a perfect cake decoration
